item.description:
The Art of Intimacy

Intimacy can happen with shared emotion, art, conversation, affection, sex or sharing any experience. It can happen in nature, alone, with another, whenever depth, trust, fun, beauty, closeness or empathy is present. Learn how to be more intimate in your life, how to be close and still keep your sense of self. Feel free to stay afterward to socialize.
Friday, June 4

7:00 pm - 10:00 pm

($40 - Sliding scale to $20)


Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in counseling, is a relationship and communication coach and therapist with 30 years experience. He teaches the Enneagram, Myers Briggs and other systems to help people understand and bridge differences. He does phone consults, teaches and coaches in organizations to help people work together effectively and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
item.name: The Art of Intimacy
